ai-thag2.10:1.4_0: like one who kills birds using a dead bird as a decoy.
ai-thag2.10:2.1_0: A holy man’s color is not on the outside;
ai-thag2.10:2.2_0: a holy man is colored on the inside.
ai-thag2.10:2.4_0: is truly a dark one, Sujampati.
ai-thag2.10:2.7_0: The first sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
ai-thag2.10:3.3_0: and the victory of the Vajirā.
